Instruction: Add ingredients in the order recommended by the manufacturer. Set the bread maker to the dough setting and begin the machine. Remove the dough when the unit signals.

Press the dough into a 12x15-inch jelly roll pan or a greased 12-inch round pizza pan. Allow it to sit for 10 minutes. Preheat the oven to 400 degrees F (205 degrees C). Spread pizza sauce on the dough, add toppings, then bake for 15-20 minutes until the crust is golden brown.
